column1: Vernon Carey Jr. with 28 Points vs. Memphis Hustle
[Highlight] Tomas Satoransky posterizes McDaniels and Vernon Carey Jr.

Hornets rookie Vernon Carey Jr. vs the Nets tonight in first career game as a rotation player: 21 points on 9/14 FG and 1/2 3PT in 35 minutes. He was a +14 in a 15 point loss, and was the only Hornets rotation player in the positive for this game.
